refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Solve the regression problem y=a*x+b in the least square sense. sig is the standard deviation of the residual. x and y are two matrices of size x(p,n) and y(q,n), where n is the number of samples.

para.note: If x and y are vectors and if y contains NaNs, then the NaNs are ignored. If x or y is a matrix, NaNs are returned.

refsection.para: The estimator a is a matrix of size (q,p) and b is a vector of size (q,1).
If y is a vector and x or y contain a NaN (x(i,j) = %nan or y(j) = %nan), then x(:,j) and y(j) are ignored, as if the point [x(:,j); y(j)] did not exist.
If y is a matrix, the function returns NaNs.
